response.overview: In 1987, the classic film tells the story of the scholar Ning Caichen (played by Zhang Guorong) who met and fell in love with the female ghost Nie Xiaoqian (played by Wang Zuxian) when he went to Guobei County to collect debts. With the help of the swordsman Yan Chixia (played by Wu Ma), the two fought against the tree spirit grandma. In the end, Ning Caichen sacrificed to help Xiaoqian be reincarnated, composing a sad love between people and ghosts. Wikipedia
response.title: Qian nu du gui
